title.rendered: Hermes Brass Square Dining Table – laminate top – MOQ 2

content.rendered:
Our Hermes Brass Range pairs beautifully with a laminate effect marble table top, or any other laminate finish. We offer the Hermes in virtually any shape and size, in a wide array of finishes.

The Hermes Brass Square Dining Table has a vintage brass finish on the table base.

With table tops made in the U.K, in an Egger finish you can customise your product to suit you. We offer the Hermes in Square, Round or Rectangular as well as Coffee, Dining or Poseur Height. The Hermes Table Range is made up of a 25mm Laminate Table Top with an MDF core and a matching 2mm ABS edge (unless said otherwise) & a square profile. Laminate table tops can also withstand harsh cleaning products such as antibacterial cleaner

We also offer this table with a 18mm or 40mm thick top, 4-6 week lead time, POA.

This extremely durable item comes with height adjustable feet. Our laminate table tops can withstand heats up to 180 degrees centigrade, meaning there is no need for place mats or table protectors.

Bases held in stock & certain size/finish table tops are made to order.  Due to the bespoke nature of this product, we recommend samples are requested, prior to ordering. Some items may require self assembly.

The Hermes Range is high quality, easy to assemble and suitable for all manner of busy commercial venues. This item comes with a 1 year warranty.

Some table tops may be textured, we’re happy to provide you with free samples should you require them.
